title: 1. IN MY SOLO SZN FEELS! How COVID Is Encouraging Me to Pivot, The Future of Esthetics + Lauren Has Left The Treatment Room
description:
Hey roomies! Welcome to season 2. In this episode I'm sharing why the podcast is now a one woman show, and my intentions for this season, my future in esthetics, how covid has impacted me as an esthetician, and more! Please let me know your thoughts, and anything you would like to hear about this season! Thank you so much for continuing to listen, and for your constant support. 

- This episode is sponsored by Hum Nutrition.

To help boost your wellbeing in the ways you need it most, take their
quick quiz
and get individualized product recommendations from their team of registered dietitians to help bring your skin, body, hormones and mood into balance with HUM Nutrition at HUMNutrition.com. 


Use my code TREATMENT
and get 15% off your first order of $29+.  

- This episode is in partnership with Forager Project! Forager wants to inspire everyone to get out and vote and participate in our democracy.They have provided voting resources and information for you atwww.
foragerproject.com/vote
and on social @foragerproject

Tess' Instagram @myestytessa 

Tess' YouTube: Tess Zolly 

Tess' TikTok: @myestytessa
